meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elizabeth Weichel Art Hilliker Dave Leach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6281.

td.p: Elizabeth Weichel, a museum collection specialist from Raleigh, North Carolina
Art Hilliker, a steel mill systems repairman from Irwin, Pennsylvania
Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,683)

tr.td: ARTHUR'S CAMELOT
PREFIXES
RECENT BOOKS
THE SUPER BOWL'S TOP RUSHER
C.S., I
ALPHABETICALLY LAST

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'King Arthur received this sword from the Lady of the Lake; it was later returned to her by Sir Bedivere')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: King Arthur received this sword from the Lady of the Lake; it was later returned to her by Sir Bedivere

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_5', 'clue_J_3_5_stuck', '(Alex: Elizabeth, pick again.)
(Judge off-stage: We\'re out...)
(Alex: Oh, we\'re out. Okay.)
[Laughter]
(Art: I\'ll go more Super Bowl questions.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: You want more Super Bowl clues? All right.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: We\'ll take a break. We\'ll come back to start Double Jeopardy! after this. It went too fast.)

Jennifer Weiner

Triple Stumper
')
